description: Get a yes or no answer.
Get the most revelant YouTube video based off your search query.
Get the highest rated Urban Dictonary definition based off your search query.
Get the text you provide spellchecked with corrections highlighted in bold.
Get a collection of images related to your search query.
Toggle automatic temperature conversion from Celsius to Fahrenheit or vice versa during conversation.
Toggle automatic weight conversion from pounds to kilograms or vice versa during conversation.
Get system usage and environment information.
Get the top search result related to your search query.
Get information about the chatroom you are in.
Get sentiments (approval/disapproval scores and relevant discussion) on the topic you provide.
Get bot usage statistics like unique users and chatrooms.
Setup a reminder that will be triggered at the time specified.
View reminders that are active in the chatroom.
Stands for Reddit Top Post -- retrieve the top post from the subreddit your enter.
Stands for Reddit Random-- retrieve a random post from the subreddit your enter.
Get a realtime quote on the ticker you specify (US and Canadian Markets Only).
Get information about the COVID-19 virus in a specified country, or leave blank for worldwide cases.
